alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Jefferson; Osage; Shawnee; Wabaunsee (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 08 at 12:20AM CDT until June 08 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Jefferson County in northeastern Kansas... Shawnee County in east central Kansas... Douglas County in east central Kansas... Southeastern Wabaunsee County in east central Kansas... Northern Osage County in east central Kansas... * Until 100 AM CDT. * At 1220 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles southwest of Meriden to 3 miles southeast of Dover to 6 miles north of Allen, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Topeka, Lawrence, Baldwin City, Carbondale, Eskridge, Tecumseh, Richland, Dover, Auburn, Overbrook, Burlingame, Perry, Scranton, Lecompton, Clinton, Lone Star, Harveyville, Pleasant Grove, Globe and Pauline. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 between mile markers 352 and 355. Kansas Turnpike between mile markers 155 and 205. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
